thread.title: Trump says it's possible summit with North Korea's Kim won't happen

title: Trump says it's possible summit with North Korea's Kim won't happen
text:
Trump says it's possible summit with North Korea's Kim won't happen 4:27pm EDT - 01:06 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he hopes to hold a summit meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and that five locations are being considered, but that it remains possible such a meeting may not happen.   
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he hopes to hold a summit meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and that five locations are being considered, but that it remains possible such a meeting may not happen.  //reut.rs/2HJ1iuL
